Reviews.Title: When he says "very good," that means "good."
Reviews.Author: Sherwin
Reviews.Content: The cellphone is in all good working condition, except for the casing itself, front and back, all signs of wear out.  He could have just simply be honest with us and tell us that there had been scratches and signs of wear out in the back of the cellphone (he is selling), instead of us knowing it on our end, later on.

ProductInfo.Features:
This product has been carefully audited and is certified to be 100% functional.
This offer includes the following accessories 1. Battery 2. Battery Cover (if applicable) 3. Wall Charger
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung A177 Unlocked GSM QWERTY Cell Phone - Black
